import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ username:'', age:'', gender:'', hobby:[] } } changeBox = (event) => { this.setState({event},prevState => { return prevState.hobby += event.target.value }) } render(){ return(

Form Practice

UserName : this.setState({username:event.target.value})} />
Age : this.setState({age:event.target.value})} />
Gender : this.setState({gender:event.target.value})} />Male this.setState({gender:event.target.value})} />Female
Hobby : Futsal this.setState(prevState => { return prevState.hobby += ' Volleyball' })} />VolleyBall

Result
UserName : {this.state.username}
Age : {this.state.age}
Gender : {this.state.gender}
Hobby : {this.state.hobby}
) } } export default App;
